00020 #include "PathCollector.h"
00021 
00022 namespace brics_3d {
00023 
00024 namespace rsg {
00025 
00026 PathCollector::PathCollector() : INodeVisitor(upwards) {
00027         reset();
00028 }
00029 
00030 PathCollector::~PathCollector() {
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00034 void PathCollector::reset() {
00035         currentPath.clear();
00036         nodePaths.clear();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void PathCollector::visit(Node* node){
00040         assert (node != 0);
00041         currentPath.insert(currentPath.begin(), node);
00042         if (node->getNumberOfParents() == 0) { //root reached so collect data in new path
00043                 if (static_cast<unsigned int>(nodePaths.size()) == 0u) { //remove the "caller's" pointer
00044                                 currentPath.pop_back();
00045                 }
00046                 nodePaths.push_back(currentPath);
00047                 currentPath.clear();
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void PathCollector::visit(Group* node){
00052         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00053 }
00054 
00055 void PathCollector::visit(Transform* node){
00056         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00057 }
00058 
00059 void PathCollector::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00060         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00061 }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 }
